welcomeText: I'm Çağatay Çalışkan, a Front-end Developer who creates modern web and mobile applications. I develop scalable web projects with React and Next.js, and high-performance mobile apps with Flutter. I focus on user experience, performance optimization, and clean code principles while developing my projects. Meanwhile, I'm progressing towards becoming a full-stack developer who can produce end-to-end solutions by learning backend technologies. I see technology not just as a tool, but as a field that makes human life easier and adds value. My goal is to elevate digital experiences to the highest level with powerful and innovative projects.

diatics.achievement1: Multi-language integration across 100+ pages in large-scale project
diatics.achievement2: React web layer development for WebView-based mobile application
diatics.achievement3: Complex role-based conditional rendering architecture implementation
diatics.achievement4: QR code-based factory fault and alert tracking system development
diatics.achievement5: Solo completion and optimization of 30+ page React project
diatics.achievement6: Reusable component architecture design and development
diatics.achievement7: Comprehensive performance optimization for application enhancement
diatics.achievement8: Advanced form builder system - multi-data types, file uploads, formula-based auto-calculation and cross-platform data entry
diatics.achievement9: Complex configuration system - dynamic form structure and conditional field visibility

netCallCenter.achievement1: 3 enterprise websites development with Next.js - 5 language support and performance optimization
netCallCenter.achievement2: Call center management system - dual role-based interface for agents and team leads
netCallCenter.achievement3: Legacy system modernization - consolidating 2 separate Pure JS projects into single React-Vite system
netCallCenter.achievement4: Real-time calling system development with WebSocket and SignalR integration
netCallCenter.achievement5: VoIP integration and call management using JSSIP library
netCallCenter.achievement6: Performance tracking system - detailed analytics and reporting interface for agents
netCallCenter.achievement7: Comprehensive authorization system and secure architecture design

metadata.description: Çağatay Çalışkan - Frontend Developer specializing in React, TypeScript, Next.js. Building modern web applications with focus on user experience and performance.
